column5: Since yesterday I lose my sign-in on the site after I get out on my phone Have to re sign in. Anybody else having this issue ?
Could it have something to do with tracking cookies?
yes if you clear cookies or use a program like C cleaner resigning in is needed.  Art
Not sure what you mean by cookies. My iPhone kept me signed in until I got a new IOS upgrade. Seems since then I have to sign in fresh every time. Can you tell me how to fix it please
I'm not the best guy to ask but I would think you will have to go into your settings and allow cookies but you might want to check with Apple about that first.
My bet is you are using Safari which is preloaded on iPhones etc....  Go to settings, Safari , block cookies , select Allow from websites I visit.  This should fix you up.  G
Thanks Gerrit. I use Safari but the settings are already as you say. What gives? Use Chrome? Peter.
turn off do not track too and see if that works
